content.heading: civic-hacking
content.subhead: Documents and materials for Bloomington, Indiana's civic hacking group.

children.text: civic-hacking: Documents and materials for Bloomington, Indiana's civic hacking group.

content.html:
Civic Hacking in Bloomington, Indiana

To paraphrase this article on opengovdata.io:

"Civic hackers are programmers, designers, data scientists, good communicators, civic organizers, entrepreneurs, government employees and anyone willing to get her hands dirty solving problems. "

Sound like fun? Come join us!

Meeting schedule

Our next meeting will take place on May 16th at 5:30pm. at 908 N Walnut Street. (Thanks to Sproutbox for hosting us!)

Stay in the loop

We've configured a Google Group so that everyone can stay connected: Google Group

Feel free to use issues on this github project as well!

Projects

Have an idea for a civic problem that needs a solution? Add it to the project page and find others interested in solving the problem.

More info

Expand on the types of civic hacking groups (e.g. Code for America Brigade) and how they work.

Supporting documents

Any materials that help with running the group can be collected in docs
